bio:
Pelena Malumea is a farmer living in Applewatch with her husband Aebond and son Ertius. Applewatch is a small farming town west of the city of Bruma, in Cyrodiil. Pelena and her husband work fairly long hours at the village orchard. On Sundas (Sunday), she enjoys a long dinner with her family and her in-laws Gergus and Cindaia (Aebond's parents). Pelena is a bit bored of the country life.
Examples of Pelena's dialogue towards visiting travelers: 
"Even the most mundane change of pace is worthy of excitement here." 
"Gergus is a good man and a strong leader. Without him this settlement would have gone to the timber wolves by now." 
"Ertius is a good lad, but a bit over-exciteable. I suppose I can't blame him. Applewatch isn't the most lively place."
name: Pelena Malumea
notes: Same VA as Amalee from 3DNPC. Vocal performance is noticeably different, but it's still better than other available options.
